price: Ey kitap ehli, niçin hakla batılı karıştırıyor ve bile bile hakkı gizliyorsunuz?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَلۡبِسُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima talbisūna al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumūna al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
